SubElement.name: Slot
SubElement.Description: A Slot is a placeholder for a piece of data to be preloaded in the .

SubElement.name: ValidationRule
SubElement.Description: A Validation Rule is a logical condition evaluated on the content input by the user in a .

SubElement.name: ParameterBinding
SubElement.Description: A Parameter Binding is a value associated with a between components, which is transported, as an effect of the navigation, from the source component to the destination component.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The output parameter of the source component (not editable)
The input parameter of the target component (not editable)
If checked, the input parameter is re-emitted as-is by the destination component
The constant value assigned to the parameter binding.

SubElement.name: LandingEventParameter
SubElement.Description: A parameter that a landing event can receive when catching a Jump Event.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: Default value to use for the parameter when the caught Jump Event does not provide it.

SubElement.name: JumpBackEventParameter
SubElement.Description: A parameter that a jump event may capture when another jump event performs a backward jump to it.

SubElement.name: Input Port
SubElement.Description: Point through which navigation enters a Module (to an Input Port Definition).

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The Input Port Definition to which this Input Port refers.

SubElement.name: Output Port
SubElement.Description: Point through which navigation exits a Module (from an Output Port Definition).

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The Output Port Definition to which this Output Port refers.

SubElement.name: SuccessEvent
SubElement.Description: The event caught when the business logic referred to by the parent completes successfully.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The Success Port Definition to which this Success Event refers.

SubElement.name: ErrorEvent
SubElement.Description: The event caught when the business logic referred to by the parent completes with an error.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The Error Port Definition to which this Error Event refers.

SubElement.name: PortDefinitionParameter
SubElement.Description: A parameter that may be passed through the parent , effectively acting as an input or output to the model contained in the Module/Action Definition.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The user-defined value to be used for the .
